name: JIMMY'S AGONY
description:
JIMMY'S AGONY is a 2d beet em up game where you'll play as Tommy JR in time between 1940's to 1960's, You'll play levels that help Tommy JR find something he want, it's against what he believe in, so will he do it, or not.

Enter through environments, from dark alleys and gang-infested streets to underground bunker. Engage in pulse-pounding battles against ruthless thugs, crime lords, and powerful bosses who will stop at nothing to stop Tommy From Reaching he's purpose.

GAMEPLAY


With help of a companion show of your punching, crushing skills to Tommy's enemies with hand, leg, and air attacks, and even grab and throw them to show them who is the boss.
